meanings.definition: Lacking a fuse or the need for a fuse.
meanings.sent1: The old flashlight was fuseless, so it never needed a replacement part.
meanings.sent2: The fuseless circuit breaker was simple to install and required no additional components.
meanings.sent3: The fuseless toaster seemed like magic, toasting bread without any traditional mechanisms.
meanings.sent4: Her fuseless approach to problem-solving bypassed the usual steps and went straight to solutions.
meanings.sent5: The fuseless car engine ran smoothly without any risk of blown fuses.

meanings.sent1: The fuseless lamp was safe to use in any room without worry of overheating.
meanings.sent2: His fuseless phone charger was convenient for travel as it didn't require special care.
meanings.sent3: The fuseless radio played music without any fear of sudden power cuts.
meanings.sent4: The fuseless clock ticked away the hours without any need for maintenance.
meanings.sent5: The fuseless appliance was reliable and never caused any electrical issues.

meanings.sent1: The fuseless power strip was a simple solution for multiple device charging.
meanings.sent2: The fuseless extension cord was ideal for outdoor use in all weather conditions.
meanings.sent3: The fuseless Christmas lights twinkled brightly without any risk of short circuits.
meanings.sent4: The fuseless generator provided continuous power without any interruptions.
meanings.sent5: The fuseless outlet was a modern design that eliminated the need for replacements.
